articles.title: Coronavirus Pandemic Shakes Up Rankings Of World's Most Liveable Cities - NDTV
articles.description: The pandemic has shaken up the rankings of the world's most liveable cities, a study released on Wednesday showed, with metropolises in Australia, Japan and New Zealand leaping ahead of those in Europe.

Vienna, the world's most liveable city between 2018-20, fell to the 12th spot, the study showed
